name: Girl Rugby Dash
description: Women's rugby is a good spectator sport. And you are a player of a new girl's rugby team. This requires hard training and leadership. Start your training right now to be ready for the Championship!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
